bibl.title: Approaches to World History in the Hellenistic Period: Dicearchus and Agatharchides.
bibl.note: See pp. 57-67: the literary activity of Agatharchides in Alexandria, and Agatharchides' expectations of the Ptolemaic monarchy and its foreign policy.
bibl.seg: ALONSO-NÚÑEZ J.M., Approaches to World History in the Hellenistic Period: Dicearchus and Agatharchides.
See pp. 57-67: the literary activity of Agatharchides in Alexandria, and Agatharchides' expectations of the Ptolemaic monarchy and its foreign policy.
